comment: Professor Munson made me really enjoy a class that I thought I was going to hate. He is super funny and really kind. Totally recommend.

I took this class as a may mester class and it was easy. He gives you all the work that needs to be completed in those two weeks. As long as you keep up with your work, you'll get an A. you'll need to purchase the textbook because it goes with the assignments.The majority of the questions to the quiz were found online.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: I took this class for a Maymester and it was fairly simple. As long as you keep up with the work it is an easy A. Professor Munson is easy to reach with any questions as well.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: If you need an easy maymester, please take him. There are daily assignments, quizzes, and DBs, but they are due by the end of each of the two weeks with an easy final. Plus, hes an easy grader. Do your work and get an A.

Probably one of the easiest classes I have ever taken. Professor Munson makes it easy to pass as long as you stay on top of the assignments as listed in the syllabus. I uploaded a blank document for an assignment by mistake and he emailed me after the due date so he could give me a grade. Very understanding and has my respect. Thank you Dr. Munson!
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: I took this for a maymester and it was fairly easy. The professor is very clear about the assignments that are in the course, and they aren't too strenuous. Overall an easy A.
Very easy class. Took as a Maymester and as long as you do the assignments you should get an A.

taking this class for my "maymester". 11 days and you have worksheets, quizzes and discussions everyday but Professor Munson is awesome! it is a lot of work but he goes straight to the point. If yall are thinking about taking music, take him!
Awesome! Do the work, and read--- you will pass and become a better singer! Awesome professor... oops Doctor!!
